slogan: Digiflashcards allows you to create multimedia and interactive flashcards.
soutien: I would like to support this project ❤️.
nomSerie: Name of the set of flashcards
erreurServeur: Error while communicating with the server.
remplirTitre: Please fill in the field "Name of the set of flashcards".
remplirReponseSecrete: Please fill in the field "Secret answer".
prenomMere: What is my mother's first name?
prenomPere: What is my father's first name?
nomRue: What is the name of my street?
nomEmployeur: What is the name of my employer?
nomAnimal: What is the name of my pet?
credits: A set of flashcards created with Digiflashcards by La Digitale
modifierNomSerie: Change the name of the set
modifierAccesSerie: Change the access to the set
confirmationSupprimerSerie: Do you really want to delete this set and all its contents?
confirmationSupprimerCarte: Do you really want to delete this flashcard?
actionNonAutorisee: You are not authorized to do this action.
selectionnerQuestionSecreteActuelle: Please select your current secret question.
indiquerReponseSecreteActuelle: Please indicate your current secret answer.
selectionnerNouvelleQuestionSecrete: Please select a new secret question.
indiquerNouvelleReponseSecrete: Please enter a new secret answer.
codeCopie: Embed code copied in the clipboard.
remplirChampNouveauNom: Please fill in the "New name" field.
informationsIncorrectes: The question and the secret answer are not correct.
tailleMax: The maximum size allowed is {taille} Mb.
erreurMicro: Your microphone does not have the necessary permissions to start recording.
aucuneEntreeAudio: No audio input has been detected on your device.
erreurFormat: This file format is not valid.
ajouterContenuImporte: Add imported content to current content
remplacerContenuImporte: Replace the current content with the imported content
